title: 话说怎么打掉方块?????

replies.author: cyqsimon
replies.txt_content:
1.3806 发表于 2014-2-26 23:10
L will tell the owner of news to give the owner of this building a flight ticket to The End as him ...
Honestly, drop your swag... Your English is not any better than that guy to the extent that I could spot more than three grammatical/usage errors in that one single sentence. I inferred that that guy was only using English for the sake of mocking while you are doing so for showing off. Showing off is pretty awesome until you run into someone who is appearantly better than you at the subject. Hence I recommend you to just STFU and stop using the @ function randomly as if it is a toy for kids.
